body:
Well, i decided to go back into making vids and i made a intro i will be using. Please note i am still a beginner at this and i do not really have professinal software/ animations because 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qoCZemaQPB0
1. Im using a laptop
2. Its old and doesn't have the resources to run video editing applications.

So any suggestions to it? ALso, feel free to check out my channel. I will do Gameplay series in Avicus as well. :) I just had a lot of homework and finding good recording software and stuff. 

So just post if it is good or ont because if not, i will change it to something else :)

title: Gaming Intro Help?

replies.body:
I actually really like it. 

I like it because:
-The music
-You don't have "YOUTUBE.COM/(username)" written everywhere like most intros
-And it's just well made. The design overall.
